pr_title: Add clarifications on how to use mediaType trait

timeline.bodyText: Not sure we want to update this since HTTP headers are supposed to be case insensitive, but the headers in both test cases are capital-J Json while the @httpHeader strings are lower-j json.
timeline.author: kstich

timeline.message:
Add clarifications on how to use mediaType trait

This commit clarifies what the mediaType trait is used for, the fact
that it's a design-time contract, and adds a missing header
serialization test to ensure that mediaType trait strings are base64
encoded.
